scripts.zip: rimraf snow-monkey-design-skin-spring.zip && rsync -a --exclude '.*' --exclude '/snow-monkey-design-skin-spring/' --exclude '/vendor/' --exclude '/node_modules/' --exclude '*.ruleset.xml' --exclude '*.xml.dist' --exclude 'package*.json' --exclude '*.config.js' ./ snow-monkey-design-skin-spring && cd snow-monkey-design-skin-spring && composer install --no-dev && cd ../ && zip -9 -qmr snow-monkey-design-skin-spring.zip snow-monkey-design-skin-spring -x 'snow-monkey-design-skin-spring/composer.*'
